Address: 229 MacKenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Entry Level Home with Enviable Block Size
If a large block and potential are your "must haves" then don't go past this newly listed property. Situated on ever popular Mackenzie Street West and offering hard to find land size. A simple 3 bedroom residence occupies 888sqms of land with a charming red brick garden shed, access to the yard via double gates with plenty of room for that dream shed, a separate bungalow - perfect for a teenagers retreat or space to work from home, and brick paved area for outside entertaining on those warmer evenings. A front porch overlooks the yard, offering privacy and seclusion. Step inside to the open plan kitchen/living area with split system heating and cooling as well as additional gas heater. All 3 bedrooms are off the main hallway with the master offering built-in robes and ceiling fan. The 3 piece bathroom is in original condition. Situated close to schools and the Kangaroo Flat CBD with the added bonus of a bus stop close by.
An excellent long term tenant is in place and would love to stay on if you are an investor looking to reap some return, Otherwise this home offers the perfect opportunity to comfortably step into the Bendigo market and capitalise on the potential and position on offer here.
Insights: 229 MacKenzie Street West, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A rise above the rest in contemporary style
Nestled in a quiet, elevated court on the Melbourne side of Bendigo, this neatly presented home is only a short drive to all that Kangaroo Flat has to offer including nature reserves, Lansell Square and the new Kangaroo Flat Aquatic Centre.
An easy to maintain front yard warmly welcomes you into this modern brick veneer home. A neutral and well considered colour palate creates a sophisticated and spacious feel as you enter the property.
A tiled, formal living area falls just off the entry as well as the master bedroom which features a three piece ensuite and roomy walk in robe with plenty of hanging and storage space.
The kitchen has been thoughtfully designed with a remarkable amount of bench space, ample cupboards and a large and functional pantry. A window and sliding door onto the alfresco area ensures the inside and outside of the home seamlessly intersect to make outdoor entertaining a breeze. An additional open plan living area flows on from the kitchen as well as a spacious room that could either be utilised as a study or fourth bedroom - giving this property incredible flexibility.
Off the kitchen and living area is an additional two bedrooms, both with built-in-robes, and are complimented with a three piece bathroom including a bath and a separate toilet. The laundry is generous and serviceable and includes plenty of storage with an additional linen press located just around the corner in the main living space.
The back yard features an impressive paved alfresco area that is fully enclosed and could easily accommodate a dining setting as well as an outdoor lounge and barbecue. The yard is well-sized and beautifully landscaped with an easy-care approach.
Additional features include:
-Two split systems
-Ducted heating
-Curtains and roman blinds throughout the home
-Gas stove top and electric oven
-Solar electricity
-Water tank
-Outdoor awnings
-Double garage with auto roller door and secure rear yard access
-Colorbond fully fenced rear yard
This contemporary home in an idyllic location, close to all Kangaroo Flat has to offer - makes an ideal market entry opportunity for first home buyers, an easy care property for downsizers or a ready to rent option for investors.
Insights: 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
RETIRE IN STYLE AND COMFORT
If you or a treasured family member want to downsize and enjoy the relaxed lifestyle, this lovely two-bedroom villa is located in the securely gated and friendly Rosedale Residential Village, with friendly communal activity hall, public transport nearby and Lansell Square shopping just across the road. Offering very affordable, independent living, it has undergone a stunning renovation, including modern kitchen, carpets, paint, and vinyl plank flooring. Large main and second bedrooms boast walk-in robes, while the master has a ceiling fan for the warmer months. The study could easily become an ideal 3rd guest bedroom.
Entry via the sun ?lled front deck leads to the spacious open plan lounge and adjoining kitchen/ dining area, well serviced with a reverse cycle s/system and gas wall furnace. The island kitchen offers modern cooking appliances, dishwasher, plenty of bench space and ample storage. A comfortable bathroom with oversized rainshower head & vanity is nearby the separate toilet. With double linen storage and private access to the carport, private alfresco area, garden shed & clothesline, this one is a must to inspect.
• Small village atmosphere so you're not lost in the crowd
• No Council Rates
• No water/sewerage charges
• Electricity, gas and telephone with providers of your choice
• Community hall includes pool table, kitchen, bingo, carpet bowls, TV area, library and is ideal for functions, birthdays etc with family members welcome

Description:
Crusoe Road Family Home on Half an Acre
Located on one of Bendigo's favourite tree lined streets, on the Melbourne side of town, surrounded by walking tracks, recreation areas, Lansell Square Shopping Centre and walking distance to the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre. Set on approximately half an acre of established gardens, this beautiful family home is not only impeccably kept and maintained but has also undergone a modern makeover in the kitchen and bathroom. Boasting an impressive list of features including:
- 4 bedrooms. The main bedroom has an ensuite and built-in robe, bedrooms 2 & 3 have built-in robes and the fourth has no robes
- 2 living areas, formal dining and open plan kitchen dining. The kitchen is comprised of auto gas cook top, electric wall oven and microwave space as well as a dishwasher. The family room could also double as a study if need be
- The recent bathroom makeover is modern with a fresh, clean feel
- Climate control is taken care of by a ducted reverse cycle system and an addition gas log fire in the sunken lounge
- Ideal for entertaining family and friends, this home has 2 outdoor areas to choose from. A huge enclosed timber deck and another undercover alfresco entertaining area. Both overlook the private backyard and established gardens
- There's a double carport and a separate 10m x 6m workshop with a concrete floor and power
Take advantage of this rare opportunity to buy a lifestyle property on over half an acre, so close to shops, schools, recreation areas, medical facilities and public transport. Call now to arrange your own private inspection.

Affordability and Convenience at its Finest

This property has all the hard work done, just move in and enjoy. Call to book your private inspection today.

Description:
Affordability and Convenience at its Finest
Experience the convenience of this three-bedroom home located just three minutes to Lansell Square Shopping Centre and the creek walking track which leads you into the heart of Kangaroo Flat and all it has to offer.
• Light filled and open plan kitchen, meals and living area.
• Updated kitchen and appliances. Ample bench space including provision for stool seating.
• Spacious bathroom including wide vanity unit and separate shower.
• European style laundry located off the kitchen.
• Three bedrooms, all with new carpets, paint and light fittings.
• Year-round comfort with 7kw inverted split system heating and cooling.
• Low maintenance landscaped yard, including single carport and two timber decking areas with wire balustrading.
This property has all the hard work done, just move in and enjoy. Call to book your private inspection today.

Description:
Ideal Family Home On 1 Acre Block
If you are looking for a property that has space for kids to play, a place to grow your own vegies and heaps of room for entertaining this one is for you. Built to accommodate the needs of a growing family this one owner home has 4 living areas that can be opened up when entertaining or closed off when family members are looking for some privacy. The large kitchen has lots of bench space and is ideal for encouraging the kids to help with the cooking. A breakfast bar, pantry, casual dining and sitting area with doors leading out to the front verandah complete the space.
All four bedrooms have plenty of storage and there is a generous ensuite and WIR to the master. An outdoor entertaining deck comes off the living room and provides a lovely view of the terraced garden. Ducted heating and cooling keeps the home comfortable all year round with an open fire providing extra ambience on those cold winter evenings. There is heaps of storage under the house as well as a lock up garage. A good sized shed/workshop with concrete floor provides room to tinker and there is tons of space for more shedding, caravan and boat parking and tradies trucks. Close to Crusoe Reservoir and within walking distance to Lansell Square there is a bus stop and state forest at the end of the street.
This passive solar home has lovely garden views from every room and gives a family all the benefits of a rural lifestyle with convenient city facilities close by.
* 4 bedrooms main with ensuite and WIR
* 4042m2 (1 acre) block
* 4 living areas, front and back deck
* Kitchen with pantry and breakfast bar
* Formal and casual dining, outdoor entertaining
* Ducted heating/ cooling plus open fire place
* Shed/ workshop, storage under, lockup garage
* Close to transport, schools and shopping
* Short walk to Crusoe Reservoir and State Forest
Insights: 10 Lowe Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Impressive Modern Living in Convenient Position
Situated in a popular new home area, and overlooking a scenic creek reserve is this spacious residence, which is sure to appeal to a wide variety of buyers.

- Ducted heating and cooling to ensure year-round comfort.

Easy access to Centro Lansell Shopping Centre, schools, medical and recreational facilities, plus a popular walking path.

Description:
QUALITY, POSITION AND SERENITY
A
light, easily managed, open plan, attractive, 2 bedroom brick veneer unit on a compact block with double gates into a great well-fenced area.
A magic, serene, bushlike setting. Rear unit (4 on block).
Instantly comfortable and cleverly maximises space, boasting neutral tonings. The morning sun filters streams through the large windows in the formal lounge & kitchen/dining area. Central bathroom comprises separate shower & bath. Gas Wall furnace and wonderful ducted evaporative cooling throughout. Conveniently, attached, single garage.
Take peaceful walks through the native bushland opposite. Shopping Centre, facilities, schools and transport only moments away.
The location is ideal!
Directions Off Crusoe Rd.

Description:
Well Established Home
Set in a well established street with a bush reserve back drop inviting in many varieties of birdlife, this beautifully presented home close to all the benefits Kangaroo Flat has to offer will make the perfect place for its next owners. As you walk through there is plenty of natural light complimented by quality window furnishings and the layout is flexible with the master bedroom and main lounge at the front, a second living space flows into the kitchen and dining with the remaining two bedrooms at the back of the home.
The build features include a double garage with single door access and additional rear roller door, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, ducted evaporative cooling, two economical gas wall furnace heaters and a highly functional kitchen including 4 burner gas hotplates, electric oven and double sink overlooking the garden.
The private back yard has a screened outdoor entertaining area and there is a concreted and powered shed measuring approximately 6mtrs x 4mtrs towards the back of the block. Located with a bus stop at the end of the street (on Helm Street), the home is walking distance to Kangaroo Flat Community Health, train station and main street while also a short drive to Centro Lansell and Crusoe Reservoir.
Insights: 5 Peace Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
PERSONALITY, POSITION & POSSIBILITIES
Set on the high side of the street, this brick home already has the personality and position, it just needs new owners to unlock its potential.
A great property for first-time buyers, reno lovers or downsizers, it offers three bedrooms, two bathrooms, separate lounge, dining room and central kitchen all wrapped around a sun-drenched courtyard.
Main bedroom at the front includes ensuite and built-ins while remaining two bedrooms, main bathroom and laundry are in located a separate wing at the back.
The kitchen features cedar cabinetry, big centre island, gas cooktop, updated stainless steel double oven, dishwasher and walk-in pantry. It opens directly to the enclosed courtyard for easy outdoor entertaining. It's a great spot to relax with a coffee and a crossword and doubles as a secure play space for toddlers or pets.
Added internal features include timber-lined ceilings with exposed beams, brick feature walls, slate floor tiles and gas heating complemented by several split system air conditioning units.
Outside, the block measures approximately 688 square metres and incorporates a double carport with remote roller door, a double garage with concrete floor and power connected, enclosed rear yard with garden shed and rainwater tank and plenty of off-street parking for caravan, trailer etc.
Located in a quiet area close to schools and public transport with Kangaroo Flat shops and railway station only a three-minute drive.

Description:
Spacious family home makes a splash.
Perfectly placed on an 832sqm approx. block in a quiet court, just minutes from the Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct, this property was built for family entertaining.
A classic-style home, the property features a spacious formal lounge, open-plan kitchen and family living area, two bathrooms and floating timber floors, as well as three good-sized bedrooms with the option of a fourth bedroom or study.
The bright kitchen features timeless white cabinetry, stainless steel electric wall oven and gas cooktop, forming part of a relaxed family living and dining area with access to the deck for seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining.
When it's time to relax, the light-filled master bedroom is the perfect place to escape; featuring a walk-in-robe, room for a king-size bed and private ensuite bathroom.
With ceiling fans throughout, evaporative cooling and ducted heating, you'll feel comfortable all year round. Don't worry about the electricity bill, this home boasts a 4.2 KW solar panel system on the roof to help you save money.
Boasting a large landscaped backyard with swimming pool, fully-covered timber deck and double garage with concrete floor, power and automatic roller door; there's plenty of room for family gatherings, social catch-ups and playtime with the kids.
Even better, the home is located in the heart of Kangaroo Flat's popular Crusoe Road area, just a few minutes from Lansell Square and Rocklea Homemaker Centre, schools, medical clinics and popular walking tracks.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in Perfect Locale
This beautifully maintained, high-quality home features a double brick construction with timeless interiors and just been fitted out with brand new carpet throughout.
Situated in an established street, just a short 4-minute drive to Lansell Square Shopping Mall with K-Mart, Cotton On, Woolworths, Coles, Cafes and the Post Office. A 2-minute stroll to lovely bushlands, ideal for walking the dog.
Boasting 4 sizeable bedrooms with built in robes, main bedroom with ensuite and massive walk in robe. Spacious main living zone flowing through to the open plan kitchen and meals are with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The kitchen is a fantastic feature of the home, boasting high-quality stainless steel appliances including a stainless steel oven with gas cook top, dishwasher, loads of cupboards and bench space with terrific outdoor views.
Ideal for the young family or equally appealing to an investor with its low maintenance backyard, with timber retaining walls and an automatic watering system. Outside is also a 9x6 metre shed with concrete floor, power and an added toilet. At the front of the home is a 2 car carport under the roofline which would also fit another 1-2 vehicle's off-street parking.
This incredible home is set in a quiet family friendly street, a short drive to the local primary schools, supermarkets, train/bus stations and just an hour and a half to Melbourne.
If you are looking for a quality family home with all the creature comforts then an inspection is a must.

Description:
Affordable and Friendly
This warm hearted country home situated on a lovely elevated corner block is an opportunity you will not want to miss. Landscaped and in excellent condition throughout.
Boasting three good sized bedrooms all with built in robes and a reverse cycle split system in the main bedroom. The spacious lounge room is flooded with sunlight from large bay windows.
The kitchen is fully tiled and in excellent condition with gas cook top, electric oven, corner pantry and good bench space. It boasts a separate dining area flooded with natural light from stunning bay windows, which overlook the front gardens. Carpet, tiles, window furnishings, and flooring are all in excellent order. There is a separate gas heater and second reverse split system air con for year-round comfort. Dining area opens outside to a relaxing paved outdoor entertaining area covered by a shade cloth pergola. Fully enclosed back yard with a garden shed and single powered carport.
All situated on a 457m2 corner block in a much sought after Kangaroo Flat locale - close to transport, shopping and schools.
Currently tenanted to a great tenant but vacant possession can be arranged at the end of the current tenancy, which is finishing soon.
This beautiful property appeals to all buyers and investors, do not miss your opportunity to secure this excellent home.
